treatment.other_name: (for liberty hyde bailey, 1858- , vigorous author of voluminous work on the genus)
treatment.description: Much, coarser than no. 38; the canes trailing and longer, 2.5-5mm. thick, bearing stout hooked prickles 1.5-3 mm. long; leaves firmer and darker, glabrescent or merely pilose on veins beneath; primocane-leaves 3- or 5-foliolate, the leaflets coarsely double-serrate; pedicels glandless. (Incl. R. connixus, Housei and Sailori Bailey)
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Dry to moist sandy open woods, thickets and clearings, Mass, to s. Ont. and Ind., s. beyond our limits.
